Package view

Class StaffHomePageView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.StaffHomePageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
view.interfaces.ViewHelperInterface, view.interfaces.ViewInterface
public class StaffHomePageView extends view.abstracts.ARenderView
StaffHomePageView class is responsible for rendering the staff view, prompting the staff to select the options he/she wants to display . This class extends the abstract base view classARenderView

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffHomePageView

      public StaffHomePageView(StaffController staffC)
      Constructs a new StaffHomePageView object with reference to a StaffController. This constructor initializes a new instance of the StaffHomePageView class and associates it with the provided StaffController object.
      Parameters:
      staffC - The StaffController object to associate with the StaffHomePageView.

  • Method Details

    • renderApp

      public void renderApp(int selection)
      Displays various options and navigates to the specified case based on user input. The renderApp method renders different aspects of the application based on the selection parameter.
      Parameters:
      selection - The view to navigate to. The valid selection are:
      • 0: Displays three options for staff.
      • 1: Displays the new orders.
      • 2: Prompts the user to enter the orderID.
      • 3: Displays the processing options for staff.li>
      • 5: Exits the system.

    • displayingOrderView

      public void displayingOrderView(int orderID)
      An interface for the staff to view the Order ID, ordered items and quantity clearly.
      Parameters:
      orderID - a unique identifier for each order

    • renderChoice

      public void renderChoice()
      The `renderChoice` method in Java overrides the superclass method to print borders for the "Staff Home Page".
